name: Agartha - The Hidden Land
description:
Make your way through "Agartha" The hidden land using your skills, with the power of ancient spirits and mystic characters reach the maximum distance possible and rank with the best!

Features:
- Unlock Characters (5 Characters)
- Unlock Spirits (4 Spirits)
- Level up your characters
- Level up your spirits
- Unlock Challenges (12 Challenges)
- Leaderboard System (Be the first of the top world 40 players)
- Unlock Accesories (12 Accesories)
- Set your unique combination!

Watch trailer!
https://youtu.be/G3anYeJW0Yc
